body.name: Recacam Solar Security Cameras Wireless Outdoor, 2K PTZ Solar Cameras for Home Security, 2.4G Wi-Fi Outdoor Camera Wireless with PIR, 2-Way Talk, IP65, 4dbi, Spotlight/Siren, Color Night Vision
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
features: Solar-Batteried Powered and 4dbi Antenna: Solar Security Camera Wireless Outdoor with a built-in rechargeable battery and solar panel can support 365 days of uninterrupted use, avoiding inconvenient manual charging. The 4dbi antenna gives this outdoor wireless camera a more stable network reception. It only supports 2.4 GHz WiFi for better connectivity/range, but does not support 5 GHz.

2K Image Quality and Color Night Vision: The outdoor camera wireless is equipped with the latest CMOS technology, built-in IR light, and dual light source white light to provide detailed and clear images and color night vision even in low light conditions. Simply scan the QR code to share the camera with family or friends and share the moment with family or friends via the CloudEdge app!

355°Coverage and 4X Zoom: The 2K PTZ camera can be easily controlled from the app with 355° pan 120° tilt (non-auto tracking) with no blind spots that covers the target area. With a 130-degree wide angle and 4x digital zoom, this outdoor-free surveillance camera ensures panoramic shots of every corner of your property (house, garage, store, etc.). This outdoor security camera supports custom alarm schedules, detection zones, and set alarm intervals.

PIR Motion Detection and Sound and Light Alarm: The Outdoor Camera Wireless is upgraded with PIR infrared detection to enhance body recognition and reduce false alarms caused by leaves and insects. When activated while in audible and visual alarm mode, the security camera detects motion at night with lights and sirens to scare away unwanted visitors and will send you to push notifications. You can also communicate with visitors or warn intruders by pressing the microphone within the app.

Secure Storage and IP65 Waterproof: The outdoor camera wireless supports SD card (not included) and cloud storage, providing double protection for your video. Free rolling 7-day cloud storage and all images and videos are encrypted so no one can access the information without your consent. The IP65 waterproof design completely prevents dust or splashing water from entering the device while operating temperature thresholds are from -4°F to 122°F (-20°C to 50°C).

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 887 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Three Night Vision Modes In infrared mode, you can see everything happening outside clearly and smoothly through the smartphone app. When switching to auto night vision (Alarm Mode), you can set floodlights light and sound an alarm if someone is breaking in. Then the surroundings can be lit to achieve full-color video if detect a motion object. Turn off Night Vision Mode, Recacam camera will keep color recording if surroundings are illuminated.

The PIR Motion Detection Outdoor camera wireless is upgraded with PIR infrared detection to enhance body recognition and reduce false alarms caused by leaves and insects. (No up-charge for Human-shape Detection Only)

Users Sharing You can share this solar security cameras wireless outdoor with your family, friends by sharing app and QR code, share recordings with your family, coworkers or the authorities. They can also receive notifications or watch the live video feed.

Support 4 devices on the same screen The CloudEdge app supports real-time monitoring of four different devices. This gives you the ability to monitor the front Courtyard, Walkway, Garage, Gate and other places in all directions on one screen. (Note: Only the outdoor camera wireless using "CloudEdge" APP is supported.)

Stable 4dBi WiFi Antennas Solar security cameras wireless outdoor uses 4dbi Wi-Fi enhanced antenna. It makes the Wi-Fi more stable and better coverage. Only supports 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi. 4X Digital Zoom The outdoor camera wireless supports 4x digital zoom. You can zoom in on the screen to view more details while watching playback or live monitoring. (No optical zoom) Schedule Alerts Plan Set the alarm schedule so the device only triggers alarm events during this user-selected time schedule. Using this function can effectively improve the battery life of the camera and prolong the service life of the camera.

Flexible and Easy Download & Playback Motion clips can be recorded securely to a micro-SD card (up to 128GB, not included) to the local storage. Online backups are also available through the cloud. Download all videos from a Micro SD card or from the cloud via the ‘CloudEdge’ app. Please never hesitate to message us when you need help or service, you can find the contacts of the Support team on the user manual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You have to know what you are buying
reviews.reviewText: So, I got this on Cyber Monday for really cheap. I just wanted a cam to stick on a large post out in the back yard to keep an eye on the dogs when we are away. For that, this camera is perfect, absolutely perfect.This is pretty low on extra features though. There is no OMNIV or RTSP support. I can somewhat understand as this is meant to be charged by a small solar panel and used on-demand. If this was hooked to my Blue Iris system constantly providing a stream, it would likely not be able to keep up with the small Solar panel. I did a port scan on the camera's IP and it found NOTHING.You can put a micro SD card in it and it will record on motion detection. That works surprisingly well and you can view the clips back very easily in the app. What you don't seem to be able to do is download the clip. I think you have to go out on a ladder and grab the card.The image quality is not too bad at all. The angle is very wide. PTZ movement is fast and smooth. Night vision is adequate. The "floodlights" that come on when it detects motion (you can turn that off) are not bad at all. They would certainly startle an intruder and provide enough light for a decent full color video feed to about 15-20 feet away.Installation is a breeze of course since it is completely wireless. WIFI reception is about the same as my Samsung s20 phone, so pretty good. WIFI setup is very easy. You select your SSID on the app, put the password in and it generates a QR code on your phone screen. Point it at the camera and it connects.One small point that most people won't care about is that it is indeed only 2.4 Ghz capable but does NOT play well with enterprise WIFI access points (Band steering). So if you run EAPs and a zone controller, you will want to create a 2.4 GHZ SSID just for these things. Odds are you already have though for a printer etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera thats easy to setup
reviews.reviewText: My experience with the Recacam 4G LTE Cellular Security Camera was very positive. This wasn't my first time setting up a security camera, so after some research, I chose this particular model for its wireless, solar-powered capabilities. Installation was straightforward and hassle-free, requiring no complex wiring. The camera's built-in battery initially needs a 5V charge via the included USB cable, but afterwards, the solar panel efficiently sustains its power. I'm impressed by the array of features, including motion detection, push notifications, remote control, a spotlight, two-way audio, and a siren. The video quality is crisp and clear, enhanced by the night vision capability. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this camera's performance and would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT CAMERA - GREAT VIDEO
reviews.reviewText: This was my first experience purchasing and installing security/surveillance cameras for our home. After doing some online research, I finally decided to go with the Recacam wireless solar security cameras. Being wireless, it was a fairly quick and easy install with no labor intensive hardwiring. Although it's powered by a built in battery, after the initial 5V wall charge, the solar panel seems to maintain the power fairly well with normal use. The features of motion sensing, push notifications to my cellphone, remote adjustment, a spot light, two way audio communication, and a siren were good selling points for me. Plus, the video is surprisingly clear and crisp, and it has an added night vision feature. I decided to use a 128GB micro SD card option for video storage so I wouldn't have any recurring online storage fees. NOTE: The micro SD card does not come with the camera. Maximum card storage size that can be used is 128GB. CONS: The instructions were a bit confusing, with broken English and lack of clarity. Chinese? I was finally able to figure it all out, but it took some deciphering. Also, you can't delete individual videos from the SD card. If the card gets too full, you have to format it to clear up space, which deletes all the videos. So, backing up any important footage is a good idea. The camera does come with a USB charge cable, but no wall charger, so you'll need to use a 5 volt 2 amp cellphone charger. I guess they had to cut costs somewhere. Overall, I like the camera and believe it does a great job for what I needed. The Cloud Edge App is very basic, but seems to work ok. After purchasing the first camera, I bought 3 more. All in all, it was a good purchase and the cameras do the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We live out in the country and installed this out at the front of our property. It is a little far from our house so we were happy it was still able to connect to the wifi. I had to play with it a little to get it to send the alerts I wanted but we finally have it lined out to where we want it. The clarity is great and I love the feature of being able to talk through it. We have ordered another one since we have a large amount of land. The ability of being able to pan around to other areas is another wonderful feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Camera, Top Notch!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I didn't have high hopes for this camera for the price to be honest. Wow! I was never so happy to be so wrong. From the features to the picture quality to the being 100% wireless this camera is absolutely amazing! It stays charged even with multiple overcast days in a row, the LTE signal is excellent and I live in a very rural area, connecting remotely isn't a problem whatsoever, it's motion detector is spot on, i HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA! Buyers take note the LTE 4G service (just like any lte 4g service is NOT FREE) but it's very cheap and well worth the money!
